name: Google - Centered
description:
Centered Google Search!
This is a centered Google search userstyle, that has some changes and fixes to help make the Google home page and the search results page centered. Great for people with wide-screen displays.
Enjoy!
additional_info:
1.0: Initial Release:
Fixes:
 - Fixes some centering issues where Google Images would center incorrectly
 - Fixes another centering issue where the 'About' and 'Store' buttons would try to center in the page.
 - Fixes the search bar not showing (sometimes) on the search results page due to a spacing issue.

Feel free to message me if you have any other issues! I will do my best to ge them fixed ASAP! :)
Enjoy everyone!
